main event: A white, oblong, rigid object was observed moving in an erratic course over Washington D.C. on March 22, 1958 at 9:15 p.m.
interesting points: The object was described as characteristic of a UFO sighting.
The object was observed for 3 minutes.
The object's angular size and speed were recorded at various points during the sighting.
The sighting was reported to the 25th CADO COG D-27 FB and forwarded to the USAF.
The report mentions a possible mirage sighting by a Senior Controller, Capt. Hitz.
